pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Interface BookDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookDAOImpl

    public interface BookDAO
    Interface for performing database operations on Message objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Detail

      • getListOfBooks

        List<Book> getListOfBooks(String hql,
                          int startResult)
        Returns the list of the Book objects for given HQL and startResult. Returns all books if HQL is null or blank. The startResult specifies the range of the results.
        Parameters:
        startResult - The int containing the value that specifies the range of the results.
        hql - The String containing the HQL Statement
        Returns:
        A List<Book> representing the list of the Book objects.

      • saveBook

        void saveBook(Book book)
        Saves a Book object in the database
        Parameters:
        book - The Book object to be saved

      • getBookById

        Book getBookById(int bookId)
        Returns the Book object with given id.
        Parameters:
        bookId - The int containing the id of the Book
        Returns:
        A Book representing the Book with given id

      • updateBook

        void updateBook(Book book)
        Updates the Book object.
        Parameters:
        book - The Book containing the Book to be updated

      • saveBorrowedBook

        void saveBorrowedBook(BorrowedBook borrowedBook)
        Saves the BorrowedBook object in the database.
        Parameters:
        borrowedBook - The BorrowedBook containing the BorrowedBook object to be saved

      • getListOfBorrowedBookByUserId

        List<BorrowedBook> getListOfBorrowedBookByUserId(int userId)
        Returns the list of BorrowedBook objects for given userId
        Parameters:
        userId - The int containing the id of the user
        Returns:
        The List of BorrowedBook objects

      • getBorrowedBookById

        BorrowedBook getBorrowedBookById(int borrowedBookId)
        Returns the BorrowedBook object with given id.
        Parameters:
        borrowedBookId - The int containing the id of the BorrowedBook
        Returns:
        A BorrowedBook representing the BorrowedBook with given id

      • getBorrowedBookByBookId

        BorrowedBook getBorrowedBookByBookId(int bookId)
        Returns the BorrowedBook object for given id of the book
        Parameters:
        bookId - The int containing the id of the Book
        Returns:
        A BorrowedBook representing the BorrowedBook associated with given book id

      • getBorrowedBookByBookIdAndUserId

        BorrowedBook getBorrowedBookByBookIdAndUserId(int bookId,
                                              int userId)
        Returns BorrowedBook object for given Book id and User id
        Parameters:
        bookId - The int containing the id of the Book
        userId - The int containing the id of the User
        Returns:
        A BorrowedBook representing the BorrowedBook with given ids

      • getListOfAllBorrowedBook

        Returns the list of all BorrowedBook objects
        Returns:

      • getNumberOfBookForGivenHql

        long getNumberOfBookForGivenHql(String hql)
        Returns the number of books for given HQL statement
        Parameters:
        hql - The String containing the HQL to be executed
        Returns:
        A long representing the number of books
